10: (* Wafer Charge Process Temp Stable Condition *)
IF Data_Change_Value.10 = TRUE THEN			(* Over Temp Alarm *)
IF Data_Change_Value.11 = TRUE THEN			(* Over Current Alarm *)
IF Data_Change_Value.13 = TRUE THEN			(* Alarm Relay3 Alarm *)
IF Data_Change_Value.14 = TRUE THEN			(* Alarm Relay2 Alarm *)
IF Data_Change_Value.15 = TRUE THEN			(* Alarm Relay1 Alarm *)

Temp_High_Spike[i](iValue := SEL(AI_Heater_PV_Spike[i] > AI_Heater_WS[i] + (AI_Heater_WS[i] * (pHeater_Alarm.Over_High[i] / 100.0)), FALSE, TRUE), iDelay := pHeater_Alarm.Over_Delay[i], ioAlarm := fbAlarm[04601 + i - 1], iInterlock := DO_MAIN_HEATER_POWER_ON, oInterlock => DO_MAIN_HEATER_POWER_ON);

Temp_Low_Spike[i](iValue := SEL(AI_Heater_PV_Spike[i] < AI_Heater_WS[i] - (AI_Heater_WS[i] * (pHeater_Alarm.Over_Low[i] / 100.0)), FALSE, TRUE), iDelay := pHeater_Alarm.Over_Delay[i], ioAlarm := fbAlarm[04581 + i - 1]);

Temp_High_Profile[i](iValue := SEL(AI_Heater_PV_Profile[i] > AI_Heater_WS[i] + (AI_Heater_WS[i] * (pHeater_Alarm.Over_High[i] / 100.0)), FALSE, TRUE), iDelay := pHeater_Alarm.Over_Delay[i], ioAlarm := fbAlarm[04301 + i - 1], iInterlock := DO_MAIN_HEATER_POWER_ON, oInterlock => DO_MAIN_HEATER_POWER_ON);

Temp_Low_Profile[i](iValue := SEL(AI_Heater_PV_Profile[i] < AI_Heater_WS[i] - (AI_Heater_WS[i] * (pHeater_Alarm.Over_Low[i] / 100.0)), FALSE, TRUE), iDelay := pHeater_Alarm.Over_Delay[i], ioAlarm := fbAlarm[04281 + i - 1]);

Temp_High_Spike[i](iValue := SEL(AI_Heater_PV_Spike[i] > pHeater_Alarm.Over_High[i], FALSE, TRUE), iDelay := pHeater_Alarm.Over_Delay[i], ioAlarm := fbAlarm[04601 + i - 1], iInterlock := DO_MAIN_HEATER_POWER_ON, oInterlock => DO_MAIN_HEATER_POWER_ON);
Temp_Low_Spike[i](iValue := SEL(AI_Heater_PV_Spike[i] < pHeater_Alarm.Over_Low[i], FALSE, TRUE), iDelay := pHeater_Alarm.Over_Delay[i], ioAlarm := fbAlarm[04581 + i - 1]);
